navigators.smart.tom.core.timer

Class RequestsTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • navigators.smart.tom.core.timer.RequestsTimer

  • public class RequestsTimer
extends java.lang.Object
    This thread serves as a manager for all timers of pending requests.
